author: Special Correspondent
text:
Four ancient idols and four puja materials, all made of panchaloha, were unearthed at the residence of S. Yasa Alabadh at Pudhu Viduthi near Karambakudi on Friday.

The idols were noticed while digging the earth for setting up foundation for a bath room at the residence.

The treasure included two idols of Sri Ambal, one idol of Sri Chandikeswarar, Sri Siva and Sri Tirugnanasambandar. The idols were exquisitely carved with ornaments and kavachams all around. The idol of Sri Tirugnanasambandar was in a dancing posture, while Lord Siva with four arms had a ‘udukkai’. A stand, Soolayutham, bell and conch were among the pooja articles which were got at the site.

Revenue officials Karambakudi rushed to the spot and recovered the idols and pooja articles.
title: Panchaloha idols unearthed
